install.name: User - AjaXplorer
install.author: Charles du Jeu
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Charles du Jeu - All rights reservede
install.description: Synchronize Joomla users (source) to AjaXplorer users (destination)

param.name: ajxp_install_path
param.label: AjaXplorer Install Path
param.description: Path to your AjaXplorer installation (absolute path on server)

param.name: ajxp_secret_key
param.label: Secret Key
param.description: The secret key defined in your AjaXplorer plugin auth.remote configuration (see conf.php).

param.name: ajxp_auto_create
param.label: Auto Create Users
param.description: Create AjaXplorer user automatically at login, not only via the Joomla administration interface.
